overview: The stars of Cuckold's Plight are as sex hungry as they are merciless in these four calculating tales from Deeper.com. A couple dominates first one side of another couple and then the other. A wife her husband to live with the choices he makes, and a first date runs awry when the woman finds a more suitable match in a chance meeting. With each story, the line blurs slightly more between aversion and arousal, jealousy and compersion, frustration and satisfaction.
title: Cuckold's Plight
